section.title: firewall_info.yml
section.para: This file provides details of all the network ports that will be opened on the deployed cloud. Data is ordered by network. If you want to configure an external firewall in front of the External API network, then you would need to open the ports listed in that section.
section.screen: <Network Name> List of: <Port> <Protocol> <List of IP Addresses> <List of Components>
EXTERNAL-API: - addresses: - 10.0.1.5 components: - horizon port: '443' protocol: tcp - addresses: - 10.0.1.5 components: - keystone-api port: '5000' protocol: tcp

para.emphasis: Port 443 (tcp) is open on network EXTERNAL-API for address 10.0.1.5 because it is used by Horizon
Port 5000 (tcp) is open on network EXTERNAL-API for address 10.0.1.5 because it is used by Keystone API
